title: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work-Versatile Foot Stool with Washable Cover-Comfortable Footrest with 2 Adjustable Heights for Car,Home and Office to Relieve Back,Lumbar,Knee Pain-Black
descriptions:
Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work! This foot rest is designed to provide ultimate comfort and support during long hours of work or travel. 

Made with high-quality foam and a durable fabric cover, this foot rest ensures superior comfort and long-lasting durability. The sleek black color adds a touch of elegance to any workspace or vehicle interior.

With dimensions of 16.9 inches in length, 11.2 inches in width, and 2.0 inches in height for the lower layer, and a thickness of 3.7 inches for the upper layer, this foot rest perfectly elevates your feet to a comfortable position. The adjustable height feature, utilizing magic tapes and a zipper mechanism, allows you to tailor the foot rest to your preferred height.

Keeping this foot rest clean is a breeze. The cover can be easily removed with the help of a zipper, and it is machine washable, ensuring hassle-free maintenance.

The non-slip design prevents the foot rest from sliding around, providing stability and peace of mind. 

Whether you're in the office, car, home, or even on an airplane, this foot rest is suitable for all environments. It can be positioned under your feet or behind your knees, allowing you to find the most comfortable and ergonomic position.

Not only does this foot rest provide instant relief for discomfort, but it also supports correct sitting habits, helping you maintain a healthy posture throughout the day.

Upgrade your workspace or travel experience with the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to ultimate comfort and support!

Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work, the perfect solution for ultimate comfort and support during long hours at the office.

Measuring 16.9 inches in length, 11.2 inches in width, and with a height of 2.0 inches, the lower layer of this foot rest is perfectly sized to fit under any desk. The upper layer boasts a thickness of 3.7 inches, ensuring maximum support for your feet and legs.

What sets this foot rest apart is its adjustable height feature. With the use of magic tapes and a zipper mechanism, you can easily customize the height to your preferred level of comfort. Say goodbye to discomfort caused by improper posture!

Cleaning is a breeze with the BlissTrends Foot Rest. The cover can be easily removed using the zipper closure, and it is machine washable for added convenience. No need to worry about spills or stains!

The non-slip design of the bottom layer ensures that the foot rest stays securely in place, even on smooth surfaces. 

Versatility is key with this foot rest. It is suitable for use in the office, car, home, and even on airplanes. You can position it under your feet for optimal support or behind your knees for added relief. 

Not only does this foot rest provide incredible comfort, but it also offers numerous benefits for your overall well-being. It relieves discomfort caused by prolonged sitting, promotes correct sitting habits, and supports proper posture.

Invest in the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work and experience the ultimate in comfort and support. Your feet and legs will thank you!
